messages.text: Oh yea, thanks.
not sure if this should come to you, but on <http://8i.com|8i.com> some of the pages are missing a fav icon, mainly those on the dev portal
Holo is using 8i-content now, dots in the bucket name caused an issue for one of amazons client SDK’s
or is `8i-content` the one holo is using?
will there be any issue if I use the `<http://content.8i.com|content.8i.com>` bucket to test on demand streaming over cloudfront?

Hey, the other thing which we would like to know is which version of hvr the asset used. 
Like 5.3 vs 6 vs new versions which come out in the future.
yea, previously its been in the filename, but it probably makes more sense as metadata
yeah we should also be able to expose that other information
oh yup, perfect
we will be storing a job id in the files that will be linked back to the studio/farm software
And then just framerate, point count, duration etc are nice to have
I think primarily it would be which bcf's it originated from so we can replace/update files with better compression.
I will try and find out what would be good to have, and let you know
I'm not entirely sure, It just came up at the holo standup. And I wanted to confirm we didn't have anything right now.
what information are you after?
Alright cool.
no, I am working on that for a new file format
Hey, is there any kind of metadata stored in an hvrs? Anything which identifies the BCF's or compression settings used?
cool
Alright I’ve added a deploy key and started using it
but probably need to keep it working in the mean time
Yea, Dave is working on build kite setup now
maybe it would be better to switch to a deploy key or something? though I think Gerred wanted to get it going through build kite or something
oh yea we are
hey are you and yupan still using the "pusher" github account for the live website?, just after the 23rd it will be removed from the org unless 2fa is enabled
Oh cool, that will be good to get a working update
just letting you know I have given William the engine team intern access to the WebPlatform repo to work on fixing up the web build
ok invite sent
Yea WebPlatform is fine for now
for the github access which repos does he need access to?, just WebPlatform?
its not too bad for now, we can rename the hvrs to force the cache to update
I might hold off for now
all good
Yea, thats pretty much what I was checking
im currently trying to get some other things out of the way so I can spend some time one it
i cant really say, the web player really needs some time put aside for profiling and optimisation
Is it in pretty good shape for public use now?
Awesome thanks
the latest build on the player branch will fix the issue
thanks
Oh right
did find an issue with the page, that middle click doesnt work for the related video links to open in a new tab
on <http://kieran.dev.8i.com|kieran.dev.8i.com> after pulling to latest is there something extra i need to do to get access to asset?
with 2 ?’s
yeah

there is now a new build on the webplatform player branch that should support orthographic projection
iv got the issue happening in orthrus
with my implementation in Orthrus I have a working orthographical camera

That affects the scale at which the assets are rendered. 
By using a larger x, y it makes the apparent scale of assets smaller.
